Package com.castsoftware.jira.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    The class Configuration allows to establish the configuration of log4j, Priority Mapping and field mapping This class is the entry point to retrieve action plan from a database
    Constants
    The Class Constants contains all the static variables used in the CastJiraConnector utility
    DatabaseConnection
    The Class DatabaseConnection establishes the database connection depending on the parameters provided in the command line
    OptionsValidation
    The Class OptionsValidation validates the options provided in the command line
    SqlStatements
    The Class SqlStatements stores the sql statement used to retrieve the action plan stored in the database
    ViolationCRC
    The Class ViolationCRC calculates the CastId to ensure that we do not insert in Jira duplicate issues.
